QuestData.Title: Wild Things
QuestData.Description: Welcome to the Order of the Cloud Serpent, $r. I can see from the spark in your eye that you wish to join the Order.$B$BLet me get a good look at you.$B$B<Elder Anli gently holds your head and gazes at your face.>$B$BHmm. I see honesty and earnestness in your heart. You have journeyed far to come here, but I am afraid you must go yet further.$B$BYour path into the Order begins now.$B$BSpeak to Instructor Tong at Windward Isle to the northeast to take the first step.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Instructor Tong at Windward Isle in the Jade Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank goodness, they finally sent someone!$B$BThings have gotten out of control!
